title: Sonbarsa, Raebareli
text:
Sonbarsa is a village in <a href="Salon%2C%20India">Salon</a> block of <a href="Rae%20Bareli%20district">Rae Bareli district</a>, <a href="Uttar%20Pradesh">Uttar Pradesh</a>, <a href="India">India</a>. It is located 36 km from <a href="Raebareli">Raebareli</a>, the district headquarters. As of 2011, Sonbarsa has a population of 1,041 people, in 181 households. It has one primary school and no healthcare facilities.
The <a href="1961%20Census%20of%20India">1961 census</a> recorded Sonbarsa as comprising 3 hamlets, with a total population of 406 people (208 male and 198 female), in 125 households and 121 physical houses. The area of the village was given as 305 <a href="acre">acre</a>s.
The <a href="1981%20Census%20of%20India">1981 census</a> recorded Sonbarsa (as "Sunbarsa") as having a population of 505 people, in 155 households, and having an area of 119.38 <a href="hectare">hectare</a>s. The main staple foods were given as wheat and rice.
